Name: TDT4 Multilingual Broadcast News Speech Corpus
Description: The TDT4 corpus contains news data collected daily from 20 news sources (13 broadcast, seven newswire) in three languages (American English, Mandarin Chinese, and Modern Standard Arabic), over a period of four months (October 2000 through January 2001).
